description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任花莲县县长，曾任中华民国立法委员。其丈夫为前任花莲县县长、现任立法委员傅崐萁。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, a member of the Kuomintang, the current Magistrate of Hualien County, and a former member of the Legislative Yuan. Her husband is Fu Kun-chi, a former Hualien County Magistrate and current legislator.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任立法委员，曾任花莲县县长。其妻子为现任花莲县县长徐榛蔚。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, currently a member of the Legislative Yuan and a former Magistrate of Hualien County. His wife is the current Hualien County Magistrate, Hsu Chen-wei.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国花莲县的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Hualien County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法机关立法委员的职位。
description.en: The position of a member of the Legislative Yuan, the legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾代理花莲县县长，为傅崐萁的正任前任，徐榛蔚的前任。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the acting Magistrate of Hualien County, preceding Hsu Chen-wei and acting for the substantive magistrate Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，接替徐榛蔚辞职后留下的立法委员席位。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who succeeded Hsu Chen-wei's seat in the Legislative Yuan after her resignation.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的一所私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任中国国民党主席。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, current Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚之父，曾任国民大会第二届代表。
description.en: Father of Hsu Chen-wei, former representative of the second National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国过去的中央民意机关与选举人团。
description.en: The former central representative body and electoral college of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

zh-cn: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 2014年举行的中华民国地方公职人员选举，徐榛蔚在此次花莲县县长选举中落选。
description.en: The 2014 Republic of China local elections, in which Hsu Chen-wei was defeated in the Hualien County magistrate election.

nodes.id: 2018年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

zh-cn: 2018年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 2018年举行的中华民国地方公职人员选举，徐榛蔚在此次选举中当选为花莲县县长。
description.en: The 2018 Republic of China local elections, in which Hsu Chen-wei was elected Magistrate of Hualien County.

en: Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管民政、户政、地政等内政事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for internal affairs such as civil affairs, household registration, and land administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest supervisory body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾花莲县的检察机关。
description.en: The prosecutorial agency for Hualien County, Taiwan, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾花莲县的普通法院。
description.en: The district court for Hualien County, Taiwan, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾蔡英文政府于2017年提出的一项基础设施建设计划。
description.en: An infrastructure development program proposed by the Tsai Ing-wen administration in Taiwan in 2017.

description.zh-cn: “理想大地渡假村”董事长，曾控告傅崐萁和颜新章涉犯贪污罪。
description.en: Chairman of 'Promisedland Resort & Lagoon,' who sued Fu Kun-chi and Yen Hsin-chang for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任花莲县政府秘书长，现任花莲县副县长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, former Secretary-General of the Hualien County Government, and current Deputy Magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚家族企业，曾由徐榛蔚担任董事长，并卷入理想大地弊案及洗钱质疑。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei's family business, where she once served as chairperson, which became involved in the Ideal Land scandal and money laundering allegations.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民进党籍前立法委员。曾在立法院就理想大地案对徐榛蔚提出质疑。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a former legislator of the Democratic Progressive Party. He questioned Hsu Chen-wei in the Legislative Yuan regarding the Ideal Land case.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，花莲县议员，曾在议会质疑徐榛蔚及其家族企业涉嫌洗钱。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China and a member of the Hualien County Council, who questioned Hsu Chen-wei and her family business for alleged money laundering.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁的父亲。
description.en: Father of Fu Kun-chi.

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月发生在台湾花莲县附近的地震，造成重大灾情。震后，时任县长傅崐萁与妻子徐榛蔚共同发放慰问金引发争议。
description.en: An earthquake that occurred near Hualien County, Taiwan in February 2018, causing significant damage. After the quake, then-Magistrate Fu Kun-chi and his wife Hsu Chen-wei jointly distributed consolation money, sparking controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国花莲县的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Hualien County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾参选花莲县县长。曾指控徐榛蔚在参加原住民丰年祭时行为不当。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, a member of the Democratic Progressive Party, who ran for Magistrate of Hualien County. She accused Hsu Chen-wei of improper conduct while attending an indigenous harvest festival.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国花莲县的副行政首长。
description.en: The deputy chief executive of Hualien County, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚与傅崐萁于1995年结婚，2009年12月18日离婚，后于2016年恢复婚姻关系。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei and Fu Kun-chi married in 1995, divorced on December 18, 2009, and remarried in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 因当选花莲县县长而辞职。
description.en: Resigned after being elected Magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 童惠珍接替因当选花莲县长而辞职的徐榛蔚，成为第9届立法委员。
description.en: Tung Hui-chen succeeded Hsu Chen-wei as the 9th term legislator after Hsu resigned upon being elected Magistrate of Hualien County.

degree.en: Department of Music, Chinese Music Division

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚是徐振兴的女儿。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei is the daughter of Hsu Chen-hsing.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁是傅兆林的儿子。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi is the son of Fu Chao-lin.

description.zh-cn: 时任花莲县长傅崐萁在与徐榛蔚离婚仅两日后，即宣布任命她为花莲县副县长，但该任命后被内政部撤销。
description.en: Then-Hualien County Magistrate Fu Kun-chi announced the appointment of Hsu Chen-wei as Deputy Magistrate just two days after their divorce, but the appointment was later revoked by the Ministry of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 内政部认定傅崐萁任命前妻徐榛蔚为副县长的行为违法，撤销该任命。
description.en: The Ministry of the Interior deemed Fu Kun-chi's appointment of his ex-wife Hsu Chen-wei as Deputy Magistrate illegal and revoked the appointment.

description.zh-cn: 因“假离婚”任命副县长案，监察院认定傅崐萁违反《公职人员利益冲突回避法》，对其开罚100万元。
description.en: In the 'fake divorce' for deputy magistrate appointment case, the Control Yuan found that Fu Kun-chi violated the 'Public Functionary Service Act' and fined him NT$1 million.

description.zh-cn: 因“假离婚”案，花莲地检署依伪造文书罪嫌起诉徐榛蔚。
description.en: Due to the 'fake divorce' case, the Hualien District Prosecutors Office indicted Hsu Chen-wei on charges of forgery.

description.zh-cn: 因“假离婚”案，台湾花莲地方法院依“使公务员登载不实罪”判处徐榛蔚有期徒刑4个月，得易科罚金。
description.en: In the 'fake divorce' case, the Hualien District Court sentenced Hsu Chen-wei to 4 months in prison for 'causing a public official to make a false entry,' convertible to a fine.

relationships.source: 2014年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚在2014年花莲县县长选举中落选。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei was defeated in the 2014 Hualien County magistrate election.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在2018年花莲县县长选举中提名为该党候选人。
description.en: The Kuomintang nominated Hsu Chen-wei as its candidate in the 2018 Hualien County magistrate election.

relationships.source: 2018年中华民国直辖市长及县市长选举

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚在2018年花莲县县长选举中当选。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei was elected in the 2018 Hualien County magistrate election.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚反对中央的前瞻基础建设计划。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei opposed the central government's Forward-looking Infrastructure Development Program.

description.zh-cn: 傅崐萁支持前瞻基础建设计划，并呼吁增加对花莲交通的预算。
description.en: Fu Kun-chi supported the Forward-looking Infrastructure Development Program and called for an increased budget for transportation in Hualien.

description.zh-cn: 理想大地渡假村董事长梁清政控告傅崐萁在土地交易案中涉犯“贪污治罪条例”。
description.en: Liang Ching-cheng, chairman of Promisedland Resort & Lagoon, accused Fu Kun-chi of violating the 'Anti-Corruption Act' in a land deal.

description.zh-cn: 徐榛蔚曾担任其家族企业荣亮公司的董事长，该公司卷入了理想大地弊案。
description.en: Hsu Chen-wei served as the chairperson of her family's business, Rong Liang Company, which was implicated in the Ideal Land scandal.

description.zh-cn: 时任立法委员段宜康在立法院质询时，就理想大地案中检方未在结案前再次传唤徐榛蔚一事提出质疑。
description.en: Then-Legislator Tuan Yi-kang, during a questioning session in the Legislative Yuan, raised doubts about the prosecutor's failure to re-summon Hsu Chen-wei before closing the Ideal Land case.

description.zh-cn: 因理想大地弊案，花莲地检署查出傅崐萁涉嫌逃漏税，依伪证及违反税捐稽征法将其起诉。
description.en: In the Ideal Land case, the Hualien District Prosecutors Office found that Fu Kun-chi was suspected of tax evasion and indicted him for perjury and violation of the Tax Collection Act.

description.zh-cn: 花莲县议员刘晓玫在议会总质询时，出示支票质疑徐榛蔚及其家族企业荣亮公司涉嫌洗钱。
description.en: Hualien County Councilor Liu Hsiao-mei, during a general interpellation, presented a check to question Hsu Chen-wei and her family business, Rong Liang Company, for suspected money laundering.

description.zh-cn: 在2018年花莲地震后，时任县长傅崐萁与妻子徐榛蔚一同发放慰问金，此举被外界批评为利用公款与善款为徐助选造势。
description.en: After the 2018 Hualien earthquake, then-Magistrate Fu Kun-chi and his wife Hsu Chen-wei jointly distributed consolation money, a move criticized by outsiders as using public funds and donations to campaign for Hsu.

description.zh-cn: 在傅崐萁担任县长期间（2017-2018年），花莲县政府多次利用县政报导、农民历、感恩餐会等公共资源为时任不分区立法委员的徐榛蔚（以“县长夫人”名义）进行宣传，引发公器私用的争议。
description.en: During Fu Kun-chi's tenure as magistrate (2017-2018), the Hualien County Government repeatedly used public resources such as county reports, farmer's almanacs, and appreciation banquets to promote then-legislator-at-large Hsu Chen-wei (under the title of 'magistrate's wife'), sparking controversy over the misuse of public office for private gain.

description.zh-cn: 2022年县长选举对手谷辣斯·尤达卡指控徐榛蔚在参加花莲玉里镇的丰年祭时，不仅迟到2小时，还要求她先行离场。
description.en: Kolas Yotaka, an opponent in the 2022 magistrate election, accused Hsu Chen-wei of not only arriving two hours late to a harvest festival in Yuli Township, Hualien but also demanding that Kolas leave first.

description.zh-cn: 颜新章是花莲县长徐榛蔚的副县长。
description.en: Yen Hsin-chang is the Deputy Magistrate to Hualien County Magistrate Hsu Chen-wei.

description.zh-cn: 此任命因“假离婚”争议而被内政部撤销。
description.en: This appointment was revoked by the Ministry of the Interior due to the 'fake divorce' controversy.
